website_summaries.verdict: Quality wool dryer balls that are also handmade and fair-trade. A reliable choice for anyone who wants to try dryer balls that are eco- and people-friendly.
pros: Organic, natural New Zealand wool dryer balls that are produced by hand using fair trade practices
Satisfied customers brag that they reduce drying time
Set of six balls with cute "sheep" graphics and a storage bag
cons: Have a slight "sheep" smell that isn't overpowering and may fade with use
May not reduce static on some types of fabric

customer_reviews.title: Loved that you got 6 balls at once
customer_reviews.text: Started shedding within 3 uses and the faint smell of sheep wool never faded away. Scent was left in laundry faintly. Loved that you got 6 balls at once, but couldnt get past the smell- which I had not had with other brands. Sent back, hard to do because I really liked the idea of the company. But didnt want to just keep them and not use em.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These dryer balls are awesome! They leave your clothes fluffy and wrinkle-free, and the drying time is noticeably shorter. I love that you can put a few drops of essential oils on the dryer balls if you want to give your laundry a scent. I like them so much, I am going to order a set for my parents. I wish I would have discovered these sooner! No more buying dryer sheets - woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: N M

customer_reviews.title: I thought these would help with remove static from athletic ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would help with remove static from athletic, synthetic type of dry fit shirts from Nike and Under Armour in the dryer (when dried without cotton at the same time). Sadly it didn’t help. However, it did speed up drying time of other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Don't do any good
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I was really excited to use these and the effect is opposite to what I read in the description. It causes more static than I've ever experienced, essential oil stained my towels, clothes are not very soft. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia Robles

customer_reviews.title: This product is impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I always like a bargain. This product was not the least expensive option. But the more I learn about Fair Trade practices the more important it has become to me. I also just loved the smiling faces on these dyer balls. I have found this product very impressive. The packaging was all Eco Friendly. There is a great booklet to give pointers on the best way to use the dryer balls. There is a great reusable bag to store the balls in. The Sheep faces on the balls are adorable. Everything about it is high quality! I will buy again after I do my 1,000 loads of laundry to wear these ones out.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Langille

customer_reviews.title: So worth it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve thought about buying these for so long as an alternative to dryer sheets, which I haven’t used for years. But I finally did it and I’m so happy I did! I was skeptical when I read these were oderless, but they really are. I’ve already noticed a reduced dry time by at least half if not more, my clothes come out with less wrinkles, less static cling, less lint, and the added bonus of pet hair coming out of the clothes! I’ve already recommended these to two friends and would highly recommend for anyone interested to get them!
customer_reviews.author: Rin H.

customer_reviews.title: One use, and I'm hooked
customer_reviews.text: I tried these for the first time yesterday, and I followed the instructions. I put them in the dryer for 10 minutes alone since I was drying dark colors. And then I put all 6 in (with drops of lavender oil) with my clothes. The dryers at my apartment complex are notoriously terrible, but even shaving 10 minutes off the standard drying time, my clothes were completely dry and static free! Everything smells amazing, I found no wool residue on the the clothes, and I found a bonus: if I leave the dryer balls in my closet, the remnants of essential oil are keeping my closet smelling wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: These dryer balls have been AMAZING. I no longer have that problem
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling with white cat hair all over Everything!! These dryer balls have been AMAZING. I no longer have that problem. I was using dryer sheets before and these work a trillion times better!! I use a few drops of lavender oil on them too and my clothes just come out so much nicer! Plus it's kind of fun to try and find all of them at the end of a load. It's like a game! And these support a good cause, I really can't recommend them enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: “ Static Away, No Sheep!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way fabric softeners smell on clothes. My husbands uniforms, different types of fabric and towels I have found that I’m having to use fabric softeners less and less. Which has caused me to have more static cling. I did try dryer sheets for fragrance and to help fight static cling.I learned that it was true that fabric sheets in the dryer can start a house fire. (So now were in the new house.)I’m still fighting static cling. When I came across Organic Echo Wool Dryer Balls. I gave it my toughest static clean pile of all towels. I was amazed! The Wool Dryer Balls took ALL the STATIC AWAY. NO SHEEP
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Miller

customer_reviews.title: You can save money and support a good cause with this
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest! From the packaging to the design... it all makes me smile! I don't know why people buy those chemical-filled static sheets. You can save money and support a good cause with this! It makes me happy when doing laundry now. I also love how I can drop essential oils on these dryer balls to get my laundry even more pleasant (and natural!) smelling than any dryer sheet could do! I am SO happy with my purchase and I will be buying more. I want the other design and I hope that they make more. :) :) :) Happy laundry days are here!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Faster drying
customer_reviews.text: so I purchased these due to reading about how these would help drying times and aide with softness. Now the only thing I didn't due was place essential oil on the ball for freshness scent. I'm afraid of ruining the wool. They really do help with fluffiness for the towels, drying bed sheets more thoroughly, and is drying clothes quicker. My husband doesn't like the sound in the dryer but I don't care, he can get over it. I LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’m always skeptical about those terrible reviews so I went with the good ones on this product and purchased these. Unfortunately, these do not meet the expectations and the advertised benefits of using these dryer balls. They do NOT reduce drying time as advertised and they do NOT reduce static as advertised. I tried everything under the sun and followed the included use instructions to a T, but these just don’t live up to the hype. Don’t waste your money or time on these! Ended up replacing with rubber spiked dryer balls that work much better!
customer_reviews.author: Lee23

customer_reviews.title: These actually do work!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical and had considered buying something like these in the past but I'm glad I waited to find these because they are wonderful!! They are worth the extra few dollars to know that they are hand made, all natural and benefitting the women who make them, and yes they take away dreaded static cling and reduce drying time and you can scent your laundry naturally by adding some essential oil drops to the balls. So if you dread the thought of all those chemicals on your clothes and then on your skin (your largest organ btw) definitely get these adorable dryer balls!
customer_reviews.author: P. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but not too practical for me.
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest things ever! They are about the size of tennis balls, and while in the dryer it sounds like you have a pair of tennis shoes banging around in there. You’re extremely well-made but I’m not sure for me they’re going to be practical. I’ve only tried them once With a large load. I know if I did a small load that it would be an even louder sound. I’m not sure how many you are supposed to use per load because I didn’t see any instructions. I put two in my large load just to see what would happen.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne S.

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the sole purpose of getting my comforter dry in one dry cycle. I have a brand new dryer, but was having to run my down alternative/fleece king comforter thru 4 times because it continually got balled up and would not dry. I put all 6 of these balls into the dryer with my comforter and it dried in less than a full cycle. I am so impressed. The packaging is very nice. These are a high quality product. I love everything about these. I have not tried them with essential oils, but I am definitely going to. I highly recommend these. I think they will make great gifts this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: These dryer balls work great
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to find these sheep friendly, eco-conscious wool dryer balls to buy. I've used them for several weeks on 12+ loads of laundry and they are great. No, they DO NOT leave bits of light colored wool on dark clothing (or any clothing). I have not been using dryer sheets since using the dryer balls and have had no issues with static cling (perhaps the people reporting an issue with this are over-drying their laundry?). I look forward to using them for a very long time...unlike the crappy plastic ones you can buy that start falling to pieces in a matter of months.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdie11

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to dryer sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Love these but if you overdry your clothes you will have static. I set my dryer to less dry, add essential oil (lavender drop to each ball) and it works great. Everything comes out really soft and my clothes smell great. If I’m drying synthetic fabrics I wet the balls down and make sure I don’t overdry. I have had zero problems with static this way.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Cure dryer balls for softer laundry and faster drying times
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using these dryer balls for about a month now. We both agree that the make our laundry feel softer and they also slightly reduce the dryer cycle time. For these reasons, we feel it was a worthwhile purchase. One area it does not do great on is static. There is quite a bit of static (currently using this in the dry winter time) if you don't use any other product. We end up still using a dryer sheet for clothes (no sheet for towels/sheets where the static isn't as important. On final minor thing - the sheep are super cute! It puts you in a good mood when you see them.
customer_reviews.author: VolbeatYou

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! They leave my clothes wrinkle free, soft, static free and dry EVERYTHING in about half the time. The BEST thing about them is that they are entirely made of New Zealand wool and are sewn in Nepal. I'm giving some as gifts and I really like that this gives women from Nepal a working wage.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lipsi

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Bags ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product makes clothes soft and reduces wrinkles/static and cute designs too. Comes with good information/instruction pamphlet and generally nicely packaged. Unfortunately, the outer paper bags on 2 of the bags I ordered were ripped significantly. I had purchased as Christmas gifts and could not use them as gifts because of that. But I will make use of product myself. Left me needing to purchase 2 more gifts. Not sure why these bags come so beat up and ripped. For sure the paper is delicate, but looks like they were used as soccer balls before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: My flock is happy and so am I
customer_reviews.text: I love my flock. These cuties do a great job softening and I'm noticing a lot less lint in the lint screen. Told a friend about them and she's sending as Christmas gifts. Thanks for a fun, effective, alternative to those chemical dryer sheets out there.
customer_reviews.author: KathleenG

customer_reviews.title: Great Cause but didn't work as advertised (Unfortunate)
customer_reviews.text: Great Cause for the women of Nepal but... Everything was perfect and as described except: it sheds light colored wool and therefore easily seen after a cycle in the American spec dryer, especially with dark loads; still got some static too. I ended up returning the item back :(
customer_reviews.author: Steve J. Park

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift When UR Out of Ideas
customer_reviews.text: I an very happy with this purchase. They do an excellent job of cutting drying time, and I know I am helping the environment as well as giving work to people who need a hand up. What a win win! Previously, I used dryer balls made by a now deceased friend. She too used the proceeds to help her church. I found "Friendsheep" quite by accident and after reading the reviews decided to give them a try. I am so delighted that I am now giving them as gifts to friends and family who "have everything". Who doesn't do laundry! These dryer balls are packaged uniquely and give the impression that you spent a bunch for them.
customer_reviews.author: Muttmom

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down drying time, eco friendly, fair trade, and organic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these friendsheep dryer balls! They’re a little bigger than a tennis ball, they do cut down on drying time, I can definitely feel the softening that comes from using them and haven’t had any issues with static, and I love that I can add my essential oils to them for a nice light scent. They did smell slightly of sheep when they first arrived but that just confirmed their authenticity to me and the smell went away after putting a few drops of essential oils on them and no my clothes didn’t smell like sheep after using them. I also didn’t have any issues with mold like some other reviewers had.
customer_reviews.author: Alinea Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Came apart after 200 uses
customer_reviews.text: They started to fall apart after about 200 drying cycles. I started noticing little fluffs of wool in the dryer lint trap and checked them out and threw one away that was clearly coming apart. The other ones looked to be ok. A couple uses later one had completely unraveled and was clogging up my lint catcher. Threw the rest out. That said - I did notice a reduced drying cycle when they didn’t get stuck in sheets or pants which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Really softens laundry
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these. These make laundry really soft. One thing i noticed though is I still have static but I am not going to use chemical dryer sheets. I think vinegar in the rinse load takes care of the static. These balls make your laundry softer than the sheets too. I add a couple drops of essential oils to them and everything smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Replace Sheets
customer_reviews.text: While I like the idea of using these natural alternatives to drier sheets, they do not prevent static. Despite the instructions telling me to not over dry to prevent static I either have wet clothes or statically charged clothes. I like this alternative, but I still have to use a drier sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian McKee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had some lamb balls I really liked...so did the dog. He chewed everyone up that fell out of the dryer that we didn't see. Did much reading before buying these. LOVE THEM!!! They do not smell, shed, fuzz, or pill. NOT MADE IN CHINA and these are organic from New Zealand. So happy with them. Nice and large, and so far the dog hasn't chewed any up. They do help cut drying time down, but I still get some static from certain fabric loads like synthetics. Definitely would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Peg B

customer_reviews.title: Best quality dryer balls - worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far much better quality than other dryer balls. These really work to dry clothes faster, reduce static, and help with wrinkles. I can’t stand the heavy scented dryer sheets and they irritate my skin, so I’m so excited somebody invented these all natural dryer balls. They come in the cutest bag and each ball has an adorable sheep face - Bri Hs a smile to my face when I’m doing laundry ☺️
customer_reviews.author: FLMom

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dryer ball purchase from this company. I love mine so much I bought a set for my daughter and her husband. He has some skin sensitivities and many softeners cause him to itch. Since beginning to use these balls they have been able to quit using softener. His skin doesn't itch as much (now we have to figure out the detergent) and they save money not having to buy softener. I'll be buying another set for my son and his wife.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Love Friendsheep
customer_reviews.text: Love these dryer balls! Everything about them says Eco Friendly, from the way they're packaged in the cloth bag to the cute little sheep faces on the dryer balls themselves. I really like them so much better being wool, a natural product, then those plastic, nub dryer balls, that can leave imprints of the nubs on your sheets. I think this is a great product and would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Snowshoe Sally

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Things
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and totally work! I have an Airbnb and do a ton of laundry, and I was concerned about the chemicals in fabric softeners and fabric sheets, in addition to not wanting to add any smells to my towels or sheets that my guests may find overbearing or not a good fit with their eco-friendly and organic lifestyles. I was skeptical of how well they would work, but they are the best of the best. My laundry dries faster, with much less wrinkles, and little to no static cling. My towels are super soft and more absorbent, and an added bonus is the cute sheep face on the balls.
customer_reviews.author: TammyC

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These balls are amazing! Washed with a light colored load for first wash as instructed, happened to be my flannel sheets. The about of lint from that load and the following loads was astounding. It’s a learning curve on not over drying but still not damp. But I am very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J Smith

customer_reviews.title: These work great at fluffing the items in the dryer and helping ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great at fluffing the items in the dryer and helping slightly reduce dry time. They do NOT prevent static, but simply dont let your dryer go as long as you are used to. You can also add some vinegar to the rinse in the washer - this works great in reducing static. I will buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: These DO cut drying time.  Hurray!
customer_reviews.text: I bought and new and improved and costly clothes dryer that is a hunk of junk. I struggle to get clothes dry using multiple cycles. I wasn't sure that the "sheep" would help, but what a pleasant surprize. These dryer balls are head and shoulders above the type I have been using. They really do speed up the drying process. Thank you to whoever developed this product.
customer_reviews.author: kla

customer_reviews.title: SOMETHING YOU NEVER KNEW YOU NEEDED BUT NOW WONT LIVE WITHOUT
customer_reviews.text: Get these now. Don’t wait. put them in your cart. Literally drying time is reduced by at least 10-15mins even with my heaviest load. Static reduced so I don’t “have” to use wasteful dryer sheets unless I’m looking for added scent. They are literally the size of a tennis ball. They don’t thump around badly so don’t worry about drum damage in the dryer. They ONLY complaint is that they do inevitably get tangled up so if you’re doing multi loads you will have to go digging to keep them in with the next load. Second set could be on the horizon. Def recommended to people.
customer_reviews.author: awhal

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these dryer balls!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started cutting out all things unnatural and potentially harmful and decided to makeover every single product I use. That included dryer sheets. I finally got fed up with static cling and bought this. They really do cut drying time in half and at a lower heat setting too. My clothes came out with only one item with a little static. No more chemical filled dryer sheets. I’m happy. The best part, adding my essential oil to one ball. All my clothes have a nice clean and subtle peppermint scent. Love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reduce drying time or static cling
customer_reviews.text: They don't reduce drying time,and there is still a fair amount of static in the clothes so disappointed there I use essential oils(1 drop per ball) which make the clothes smell wonderful,and last for numerous loads They do make quite a lot of sound bouncing around in the dryer. Happy enough with them though,as I wasn't using any dryer sheets or fabric softener before I got them so the static isn't a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rythmjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with these dryer balls. They do, indeed, reduce wrinkling, and my clothes seems a little softer. Some loads do have static cling, but I have noticed it was mostly due to the fact that a certain fabric was included in the load. I will separate loads with synthetics and fleece, and do those separately. I love that I am no longer applying chemicals to my clothing with dryer sheets. I also feel good about supporting free trade.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Work great when all used at once, and dogs love to steal them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife, she loves them. Seems so do my dogs, they always seem to sneak their heads in drier and grab one. Good thing its just wool. They really do work on most things, they cut down on drier sheet use. We do throw all of them in the drier at once. I've owned these for many years and still going strong... except the couple that got stolen by my dogs..
customer_reviews.author: Captain Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my laundry AND the landfill
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my first set of Friendsheep for over a year. They work great and I dont add scent. This year I ordered 3 sets for Christmas presents so you know I think they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these after being diagnosed with contact dermatitis/eczema and trying to eliminate as many chemicals from our home as possible. They really do work, they cut the drying time down and keep your clothes extremely soft and a bonus is that they seem to leave clothes with less wrinkles too. In my opinion, our clothes are softer with these wool balls than using fabric softeners (chemicals).
customer_reviews.author: Warnali

customer_reviews.title: Cute dryer balls that work well
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 of the recommended 6 balls for a dryer load of dark clothes last evening. They did a good job of keeping the clothes from wrinkling. Some of these type of balls that are available cost more for 3 of them than I paid for the six and they are the same size. These are very well made and so cute with the sheep face on each of them! The company wants you to be happy with your purchase and follows up with you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to change up my laundry detergent and eliminate fabric softener sheets due to skin irritation and allergies. These are the perfect alternative plus they are very cute. The only drawback is they can be a little noisy in the dryer. I also bought a second set (penguins) for my husband who prefers a light scent and I planned to add essential oil drops but the second set had a strong mothball smell. Still worked well but took a while to get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: M0b3tt3r

customer_reviews.title: They work! Care for our earth.
customer_reviews.text: The care and detail put into the packaging is adorable. The wool balls are tennis ball size and perfect for a huge load of laundry. I add essential oils to mine but haven't notice the essential oils smell yet on them. I think I need to add more drops to the balls. I immediately noticed less wrinkles and shorter drying times in my loads. They're balls, like tennis balls, so common sense tells you, you WILL hear the bounce of them as the dryer is running. It's not overly loud and hasn't bothered me one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Arelis Cortés

customer_reviews.title: Dries clothes faster and last for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: These dryer balls are fantastic. You can put them in the dryer without having to worry about color transfer and there’s no static cling. Just put a few drops of essential oil on them and toss them in. I use 3 at a time then rotate them so they can last longer. Much more environmentally friendly than dryer sheets. These last for a very long time. Definitely worth the cost. Bought some as a gift for a family member for Christmas and they love them! They even dry your clothes faster causing less energy and better on your wallet
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Scheid

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I chose these because of their cute faces, and they were for a sheep raiser. The laugh is on me! They are much loved. Tired of scented dryer sheets? These are for you! Clothes are at least as soft with these, and they cut drying time! So, I bought more of these cute sheep for myself. Loving these baaaaaad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Natural Dryer Product!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that I was skeptical at first. My first load was white towels. They came out perfect, as expected. Now, the real test, my dark clothing. When the dryer finished, I was amazed at the lack of wrinkles and static in the clothing. No fuzzy residue, just wrinkle free dried clothes. Even one of my skirts that can be problematic came out great. The drying time was reduced too, saving on my utility bill. I am no longer a skeptic, but a fan!!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Friendsheep Organic Eco Wool Dryer Balls - eaten by dog - and replaced
customer_reviews.text: These dryer balls have a cuteness factor that make them hard to resist! A friend purchased a set of Friendsheep Organic Eco Wool Dryer Balls a while back - and her dog couldn't resist the cuteness factor either! He managed to mangle them pretty badly when the door to the dryer was left opened, so I got her a replacement set as a present. Have pets? Remember to leave the dryer door closed and you will be happy with your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Frank

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept and will put essential oil on them ...
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I have only used them once. I love the concept and will put essential oil on them for the next cycle. The only thing so far that I am disappointed with is that they did not help with static. I wanted to switch from dryer sheets to the wool dryer balls. I will continue to use them and see if things improve. I wanted to be honest with my review.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Azbill

customer_reviews.title: These work for me
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these dryer balls for over a year and I find they help cut the drying time a bit on each load. I do not using any oils etc to scent these, I use them as is so there is no fragrance added to my laundry. I'm not sure if they are adding softness to the clothes. While there are other offers out there at lower prices, I am willing to pay the extra few dollars to support them
customer_reviews.author: WayOutWest

customer_reviews.title: ​ I love it and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I originally reviewed this a 5 star because I only got 5 out of 6 balls. NOT true. Found the other under the piano. Must have rolled out of box when I originally opened it. In any case, I love it and will buy again. I have recommended this to several of my clients. Healthier way to dry clothes and save drying time. UPDATE: So sorry, found the 6th one. It must have rolled under the piano​ when I originally opened the package and did not notice!
customer_reviews.author: Magic Hands

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my Friendsheep balls!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect but I'm trying to cut down on some of the chemicals around the house and a friend suggested wool dryer balls. I did some research on who had the product that did what I was looking for (less chemicals and quicker drying time) and Friendsheep seemed the best. I am so glad that I ordered them!! I've run a couple dozen loads with them and the exceed my expectations!!! My clothes are soft and there's no static! When I read what the company stands for and what they are doing I was even happier with my purchase. I'll be buying more to give away to friends and family!! Thanks Friendsheep!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer balls
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these dryer balls a few times so far , but they work great! No lint on my clothes, no static, and soft laundry. I do not use any scent on them-I am very sensitive to odors and especially the scented dryer sheets and laundry products in general. I just donated all my unused dryer sheets to a Women's Shelter.
customer_reviews.author: jane link

customer_reviews.title: No dryer sheets in 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2016 and they are still going strong. I love that there are no chemicals and you can add essential oils for scent if you wish. I also like that they are a fair trade product. I will be purchasing more because I have lost a couple. They probably rolled under something while I was folding laundry. The only negative is that they dont always remove all the lint so you do have to lint roll some items.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: These Dryer Balls are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Organic Wool Dryer Balls not being sure if they would work. They definitely do! I put them in with bed sheets that constantly would get tangled and take forever to get completely dry. These balls solved the problem. All of the sheets were dry in record time and they are very quiet in the dryer so that was an added bonus. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Going Green
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a friend who sells essential oils that she uses wool dryer balls instead of fabric sheets due to the chemical composition of the dryer sheets. I am trying to reduce chemicals in my home and purchased the Friendsheep Organic Eco Wool Dryer balls. I just started using them, and have added some essential oil to them for the lovely scent. Although I have just started using the "sheep" I am sensing that my clothes are drying more quickly and I am helping the environment. The Friendsheep are so very cute, I am thinking of purchasing more for Xmas gifts! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Grover

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I received these today, which was very quick for Alaska. I have done 3 loads with them and I can already tell the difference. These are amazing. They make a bit more noise in the dryer than the usual spiky balls, but, that is okay. The sheets and clothes came out noticeably softer and fluffier. I honestly didn't think that would actually happen. I can't wait to try them on towels. This is my new favorite Christmas present to the people I know who already have everything!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M Chesbrough

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase the wool dryer balls but I wanted to stop using dryer sheets so I decided to try them. I have been very happy to date. I have noticed a decrease in dryer time, the clothes feel softer and no static. I've tried tennis balls and other dryer balls but these have worked best for me. I also noticed my dryer accumulates less lint. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my dryer balls August of 2019 and they are holding up well, no odor, still beat the living....ah...helps with my clothing in the dryer, especially my sheets and pillow cases...being soft material, the noises isn't bad at all. I use three in the dryer, I have a small laundry set up, stackable washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: msthamara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO GLAD I purchased these! No more expensive, "environmentally-unfriendly" dryer sheets for me! I put a couple of drops of essential oil on mundane Friendsheep dryer balls and my laundry smells amazing and dries more quickly! And they're so cute!! They make me happy. Plan to buy and give as gifts this Christmas--but would also make a great wedding gift or "new home" gift with some essential oils! 🎉❤️
customer_reviews.author: Miss Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are they cute, but they work! I have 2 sets already (1 for whites and 1 for darks) though I really don't think it is necessary to have 2 sets. They shorten drying times and I find things feel softer and are wrinkle free. Occasionally, they get static but it is not a big deal. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer Balls!
customer_reviews.text: These dryer balls are great! Used them with my load of bedding, and they kept the sheets from getting all wadded up in a ball in the dryer. In the towel load, they made my towels feel softer. They don't make as much noise in the dryer. I have seen no lint on the dark clothes and the jeans did not turn the balls blue! And the design on them makes me smile:-). What more can I say? I love them! Much better than my old plastic ones!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Revived my dog's bed
customer_reviews.text: I just got these and did three loads of laundry today. While they are noisy (they are the size of tennis balls and a bit heavier) they do a great job of fluffing up towels. My dog bed has been revived. It was flat and now it is fluffy. They did seem to make drying a bit faster but after using for only one day I can't really say.
customer_reviews.author: Jackdmom

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dryer balls so much I ordered a set for all of my siblings for Christmas gifts. Ditched the dryer sheets after daughter was having skin issues - been using these for two weeks with excellent results. Our towels seem more absorbent and our clothes come out soft and static free. I also have noticed that big loads dry much more quickly now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AR Mom

customer_reviews.title: and they work way better than tennis balls in the dryer when you are ...
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, all-natural, and they work way better than tennis balls in the dryer when you are drying a down coat. In general use, they do seem to eliminate static, and make the dried loads softer. I can't say whether or not they actually decrease drying time, but if they do, that would just be a bonus prize. A definite two thumbs up on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly effective! These little guys really do work. They sped up my drying time, helped with the hair, wrinkles, and static. Best of all when you add a little of your favorite essentials oils, you get a light fragrance burned into your clothes. I love using this particularly on my sheets and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Reduced ironing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Friendsheep dryer balls. I have use other brands and thought they were ok. However, when I replaced the old with Friendsheep dryer balls, there was a great difference. My husband thought I had already ironed his shirts.The clothes came out much neater! (They are cute, too, and come in some other designs.)
customer_reviews.author: Smomm

customer_reviews.title: These work great...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I like using natural products and these organic wool dryer balls fit well in our household. I do recommend washing them first due to any possible shedding. They cut down the drying time of jeans and towels considerably, and add softness and remove static cling. Hope you like yours, as well as we like using ours.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love them !
customer_reviews.text: These are great . I have noticed softer clothes and towels . Also definitely reducing the amount of dog hair I see on our clothes . No smell , no pilling on our clothes . Super cute product for gifts as well !! Only down side is the noisy drying but hey ... there are 6 ballls in there what would you expect ?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about these wool balls all my life. I always loathed doing laundry and folding my clothes right as my laundry was done. In the end I would be left with a dryer full of wrinkled clothes and I would just take the clothes strait from the dryer wrinkled or not and wear them that way. I started using these balls and the wrinkles are gone! All the whole my clothes are dry, look and feel great, and I’m not using a chemical product to make my clothes soft. One of the Best Buy’s I got off of Amazon this far.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Todd

customer_reviews.title: I like the wool dryer balls
customer_reviews.text: I like the wool dryer balls, though I will say I have more static in my clothes. Guess you have to decide if it's worth a little static to give up having the chemicals from dryer sheets. I will continue to use them because of that reason - they are super cute also!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! This is the first time I had ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect ! This is the first time I had ever purchased Eco Wool Dryer Balls as well as a first time purchase from Friendsheep and I love it !... I used a combination of rose and lavender and essential oils for a little fragrance and couldn't be happier ... highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: Dra. A Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Friendly Friensheep
customer_reviews.text: I had an older set from another company that were several years old. It was time to replace and these met all of the criteria re: how and where they were made and also positive reviews. The sheep are a fun bonus. The item arrived quickly and undamaged and the bag is also good for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo888

customer_reviews.title: Wool dryer balls
customer_reviews.text: After losing our old wool dryer balls when our old dryer was hauled away, we needed to find a replacement. Not remembering where we got the originals, we searched for them on my phone during a lunch break at a diner. The wool dryer balls are kinda retro, but the ordering method was very 21st century. Anyway, throw away your chemical dryer sheets and pick yourself up some wool dryer balls. They're awesome and these are.......cute.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stankowitz

customer_reviews.title: Love these dryer balls!
customer_reviews.text: Love these dryer balls. My dog got ahold of one and tore it up so I ordered a cheaper set of gray ones, they pilled with the first use plus have not maintained their shape. These balls have held up well and look like they did when I purchased. I also like that I can add essential oils for fragrance. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE DOGS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing / ruined my towels / returned
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was really looking forward to this product for various reasons - less waste, eco-friendly, less expensive overall, no more dryer sheets, etc. I’ve used them 4-5x now and each time my clothes are les and less soft and my normal soft expensive towels are now brittle and dry. Those are ruined unfortunately. Wish I was writing a favorable review. Disappointed and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, healthy option!
customer_reviews.text: As I’ve been changing our household over to natural products, I’ve been discover just how heavy artificial aromas and fresheners truly are. Dryer sheets were the last tho g I had to switch over; when I walked down the llaundry aisle looking for natural alternatives (of which there weren’t any), I was hit with nausea and headache that took several hours to dissipate. A friend had previously recommended this product so I came home and ordered them. My husband and I really love them! They work wonderfully for softening laundry, and deodorize well when combined with essential oils. After a two months’ use, we highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dryer balls! Clothes comes out soft and wrinkle/ static free. I’ve used them to dry clothes and thick towels. I’m saving a lot on dryer sheets. Plus they have no scent which is perfect for my allergies. I liked them so much I sent them as a gift to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to chemical dryer sheets
customer_reviews.text: The Friendship Organic Eco Wool Dryer Balls work as advertised and are a great alternative to chemical dryer sheets. My wash loads are normally rather large, so I use all six wool balls and I have found that my clothes and towels feel soft right out of the dryer and there is no artificial smell. I also like the fact that they are made by people who receive a decent wage for their work.
customer_reviews.author: Road King Rider

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Benefits to using these!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these dryer balls! There are multiple benefits we have noticed so far: the clothes don’t get tangled together, static seems to be eliminated, and drying time seems to be shorter which saves on our electric bills! Such a simple solution. We wish we had found out about them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: A+A

customer_reviews.title: Great eco freindly alternative
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had these dryer balls long enough to see how well they last, but I love the wonderful packaging, --eco friendly, etc and great message--and they have worked well in the dryer so far. Also, really like that they are fair trade--actually the single reason I bought these particular organic dryer balls over some others.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kukachka

customer_reviews.title: the sheep faces look exactly like the ones in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the expectations would not be met - surprise!!! the sheep faces look exactly like the ones in the picture. Good nice tennis ball size. there are 6 of them, not 7 like on the picture in add. Actually feeling stupid for getting excited looking for these little sheepies in the dryer :)
customer_reviews.author: Ivars Stonins

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have to throw money at dryer sheets, this does the job superbly. I don't get lint on my clothes from the wool. I've used it from heavy towel loads to delicate cotton dress shirts. It does it all. I've been using these for about 4 months and I am pleased:) It is a quality product from a company that is doing the right thing. Please support them and save time, money, and give some love to the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor g

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in an adorable reusable cloth bag that you can keep the balls in between use. I'm so glad I purchased these. I put a few drops of lavender on the sheep balls and toss them all in with my bed sheets and it is amaazzzzing. I am now in love with this company because of their passion for natural alternatives to everyday items, and reducing waste. Their chemical free products are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: No Clinging
customer_reviews.text: I like that my clothes do not cling together. I do get some lint from my loads of laundry, but maybe that will decrease as time goes by. Overall I enjoy using these Wool Dryer Balls and look forward to no more dryer sheets.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieC

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I knew these were going to be fun and eco, but I have my doubts about how well they would work. I'm glad to report that despite my skepticism that the do actually keep my laundry free of static and my clothes come out of the dryer just as soft as when I added dryer sheets. And the little sheep faces make me smile!
customer_reviews.author: A. Budner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: They bounce through the dryer and are a great replacement for dryer sheets. I do have one complaint from my puppy. She thinks they are hers. When I take out a load of clothes and a ball falls to the floor, I have to really quick to pick it up. She is not pleased, but I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LBJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer Balls
customer_reviews.text: I had a different pair of dryer balls for a couple of years and noticed that weren't working as well after probably 250 washes so I ordered these. You could immediately tell these are better made and they have been more effective in use. I also like the story. This is a purchase you feel good about.
customer_reviews.author: mtodde

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Drying sheets were leaving the residue on my clothes and dryer. These are adorable and environmentally friendly. Clothes are not staticky after drying. I also have sensitive skin and try to avoid perfumes. These are not scented. I wish I got them sooner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These dryer balls are functional as well as cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these adorable dryer balls!! They dry our clothes without spending extra money on fabric softner or dryer sheets. No static cling at all. Wish I had done this earlier!! Would recommend these to anyone who's looking to cut back on money and waste.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think they'd be this cute
customer_reviews.text: These dryer balls are adorable. They are a gift and the person loves sheep, so this should be perfect! Don't hesitate on these. They are larger than they look in the picture. Come in a reusable bag to store them in and have a nice, fresh scent to them.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with the Friendsheep dryer balls!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for an alternative to dryer sheets I stumbled upon wool dryer balls. When I searched for them on Amazon I was surprised how many different options there were. After reading many reviews and comparing all my options I decided to go with these, and am so glad I did! Not only are they super cute, but the packaging is great too. I am so impressed with the quality of the product and this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as I had hoped!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer balls performed just as I had hoped they would. I used my dryer's moisture sensor dry setting on "less" with shirts and had no problem with static cling. Went ahead and dried towels on "more" dry setting and still had no static. Their little smiling faces make me smile when I open the dryer! Goodbye Bounce!
customer_reviews.author: joanne fiddler

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional. Supporting a good cause.
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the fact that these look adorable, they work incredibly well. They do everything they promise (reducing static, decreasing drying time and decreasing wrinkles). I have noticed some pilling on the dryer balls as written in instructions but doesn’t bother me-it’s a natural product after all. I feel good supporting this fair trade company and also reducing waste by using these wool dryer balls.
customer_reviews.author: HealthNut

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Friendsheep Dryer Balls
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Friendsheep Dryer Balls! I have tried other types of dryer balls and my clothes were dry, but not soft. The Friendsheep Dryer Balls made all of my clothes so soft! I put essential oils on the sheep and the scent continues to last after multiple uses AND I ran my dryer on a lower setting for less time, which will save money!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for health, earth, conscious people
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I love the fact that this company is earth friendly, fair wages for people struggling to survive, and animal friendly by not supporting harsh animal treatment of the sheep they get their wool from. Also I added a few drops of lavender and lemon oil to them and my laundry smelled great! The laundry also dried faster than without them. I also love the fact that these Don't shed... at all! I've used them on white loads, colored, and dark loads. No lint!
customer_reviews.author: B. Skrodzki

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at the difference these little balls made to my laundry.
customer_reviews.text: These little balls really work. Before I had to dry a load on high for 60 to 90 minutes to get dry. But now, I can go to the medium setting for 40 to 60 minutes and get the same size of loads dry. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay P

customer_reviews.title: Works REALLY well!
customer_reviews.text: These are so wonderful, and I like that they work exactly as described-- dried the clothes much faster and the clothes were very soft and not wrinkled. The packaging is completely eco friendly, and I DID choose these above all other choices because of your FAIR TRADE practices. AWESOME all the way around. (I liked them so much I bought some for my daughter too.)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Joyce Greene

customer_reviews.title: Reduced Static Cling on Every Kind of Load and No More Antistatic Sheets.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a little over a week now on heavy loads, light loads, polyester, towels, cottons and jeans. I would say that they reduce drying time by closer to 10% to 25% and I have had no static problems. I have asthma and am trying to avoid fragrance antistatic sheets and chemicals in my dryer. They make a little bit of noise bouncing around in the dryer but not bad at all. All of my friends can expect to get them as gifts soon.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

product_meta.title: Friendsheep Organic Eco Wool Dryer Balls - 6 Pack - 100% Handmade, Fair Trade, Organic, No Lint - Premium Quality
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR BABIES AND SENSITIVE SKIN. Made of 100% pure New Zealand wool (no cheap fillers!!), organic, chemical free, fragrance free, hypoallergenic. FOR SAVVY MOMS that know that dryer sheets leave behind harmful chemicals that will reduce the absorbency of cloth diapers, reusable bed pads, cloth menstrual pads, and ruin waterproof layers.

SAVE TIME, MONEY, AND ENERGY! Eco-friendly and reusable for 1000+ loads each ball. Leaves your laundry NATURALLY SOFT, reduces wrinkles and static cling, without harming your laundry with synthetic chemicals like PVC or tennis balls. Plus, helps you reduce drying time by 20-40%. NO LINT! Perfect for dark, white, and colored loads.

HAND MADE IN NEPAL and NOT IN CHINA (like most other brands!). Carefully needle felted by hand in ethical working conditions by women of underprivileged communities. Traditionally hand made and sun dried, no chemicals or tricks to accelerate production. Fair wages and care for the environment. No unfair, forced, or child labor, ever!

THE PERFECT ECO-FRIENDLY ALL OCCASION GIFT. Beautifully packaged. For a unique and fun laundry, baby showers, bridal showers, housewarming, mother’s day, for your best friends, or a college kid about to start his own laundry. Comes in a beautiful and handy BONUS organic cotton gift bag, with an instruction manual full of eco-friendly tips.

CHOOSE WISELY! These set will last you for several years so don’t save on quality, get the best! 100% pure New Zealand wool, traditionally hand made in Nepal, organic and fairly traded, then packaged with passion and care by stay at home moms here in the USA. GIVE YOUR SELF AND YOUR LOVED ONES THE GIFT OF FRIENDSHEEP!
